faq.faq1Question: What is the shipping method and delivery time?
faq.faq1Answer: Shipments are made by Correos Express, the delivery time is 1-3 working days for continental Portugal and 2-10 working days for Açores and Madeira. Delivery time to Spain varies between 1 and 4 working days.
faq.faq2Answer: Payment on the website is made exclusively by cash on delivery. If you wish to pay by ATM reference, please place your order through our instagram or Whatsapp.
faq.faq3Question: Are the products on the website always available?
faq.faq3Answer: They are generally always available unless they run out of stock. Replacements are usually made within 2 working days.
faq.faq4Question: Where can I check customer feedback?
faq.faq4Answer:
You can see some of the feedback in the home page, we already have more than 10,000 customers!
Thank you!
